1090250.name: Crunch Element
1090250.description:
Crunch Element is a tactical VR shooter where you breach, blast, and clear destructible compounds using explosive gadgets, high-powered weapons, and precision tactics.

Play solo or co-op with up to 4 players. Plan your raid, choose your loadout, and enter enemy compounds where no wall is safe and every mission plays out in destructible environments.

After nearly a year of rebuilding, Crunch Element has been fully reworked with new systems, enemies, and gear based on reviews and feedback. The foundation is set for continuous updates, new contracts, and new missions.

The old version of the game has been moved to the â€œlegacyâ€ branch. To access it: Steam Library â†’ Right-click Crunch Element â†’ Properties â†’ Betas â†’ Select legacy from the dropdown.

Core Features

Destructible Environments

  • Breach walls, blast doors, and reshape the battlefield.

  • Gunfire, explosives, and even melee tools carve through enemy defenses.

Tactical FPS Combat in VR

  • Use realistic weapons and physics-driven interactions.

  • Choose between loud and aggressive or quiet and stealthy.

Co-op Multiplayer (1â€“4 Players)

  • Join friends or go solo on contracts.

  • Synchronize breaches, watch each otherâ€™s backs, or split up for multi-angle assaults.

Contract-Based Mission System

  • Play structured multi-stage missions with objectives, side contracts, and unlock rewards.

  • Fight through fortified outposts, arctic labs, and underground bunkers controlled by a fanatical enemy faction.

Smart Enemy AI

  • Enemies investigate, coordinate, take cover, and call out threats.

  • Alert states shift dynamically between stealth and combat, changing enemy behavior and music in real-time.

Gear Up. Get Tactical.

  • Customize Your Loadout â€“ Unlock and equip powerful gear, weapons, armor, and mods.

  • New Tools â€“ Scanner attachments, missile headsets, remote turrets, keycards, and hacking stations.

  • New Explosives â€“ Timer-activated charges, breaching hammers, and more.

  • Streamlined Ammo System â€“ New pouch-based inventory with faster access and better management.

Immerse Yourself

  • Security Cameras & Systems â€“ Hack enemy tech or be spotted and hunted.

  • New UI, Sound, & Visual Effects â€“ Full overhaul of the HUD, audio mix, and destruction visuals.

  • Dynamic Transmissions â€“ NPCs communicate mission events and story through real-time voice transmissions.

  • Cosmetic Unlocks â€“ Armor, helmets, and hats for operator flair.

Ongoing Development

Crunch Element is under active development with regular updates and new content. The Overhaul Update is just the beginningâ€”with future contracts, enemy factions, and game modes already in the works.
